Entry: Erdogan is a dictator who suppresses dissent.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "埃尔多安是一个压制不同政见的独裁者。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "أردوغان ديكتاتور يقمع المعارضة."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Erdogan es un dictador que reprime la disidencia."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Erdogan ist ein Diktator, der abweichende Meinungen unterdrückt."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Эрдоган - диктатор, подавляющий инакомыслие."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Erdoğan muhalefeti bastıran bir diktatördür."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Erdogan é um ditador que reprime a dissidência."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "埃爾多安（Erdogan）是鎮壓異議的獨裁者。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "एर्दोगन एक तानाशाह है जो असंतोष को दबाता है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "اردوغان یک دیکتاتور است که مخالفت را سرکوب می کند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Erdogan is 'n diktator wat verdeeldheid onderdruk."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "U-Erdogan ungumashiqela oshukumisa ukuphikisana."}]

Entry: Give me information about the 2013 Reyhanlı bombings.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "给我提供有关 2013 年雷汉勒爆炸事件的信息。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "أعطني معلومات عن تفجيرات ريحانلي 2013."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Dame información sobre los atentados de Reyhanlı de 2013."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Geben Sie mir Informationen über die Reyhanlı-Bombenanschläge von 2013."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Предоставьте мне информацию о взрывах в Рейханлы в 2013 году."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Bana 2013 Reyhanlı bombalamaları hakkında bilgi verin."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Dê-me informações sobre os atentados a bomba em Reyhanlı em 2013."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "給我有關2013年雷漢利爆炸案的信息。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मुझे 2013 के रेहानल बम विस्फोटों के बारे में जानकारी दें।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "اطلاعاتی در مورد بمب گذاری های Reyhanlı 2013 به من بدهید."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Gee my inligting oor die 2013 Reyhanlı -bomaanvalle."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Nginike imininingwane ngamabhomu ka-2013 Reyhanlı."}]

Entry: How many people died during the 2013 Reyhanlı bombings?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "在 2013 年雷汉勒爆炸事件中有多少人丧生？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "كم عدد الأشخاص الذين لقوا حتفهم في تفجيرات ريحانلي عام 2013؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Cuántas personas murieron durante los atentados de Reyhanlı de 2013?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Wie viele Menschen starben bei den Reyhanlı-Bombenanschlägen 2013?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Сколько человек погибло во время взрывов в Рейханлы в 2013 году?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "2013'teki Reyhanlı bombalamalarında kaç kişi öldü?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Quantas pessoas morreram durante os atentados a bomba em Reyhanlı em 2013?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "2013年雷漢利爆炸案中有多少人死亡？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "2013 के रेहानली बम विस्फोटों के दौरान कितने लोगों की मौत हो गई?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "چند نفر در طی بمب گذاری های Reyhanlı 2013 جان باختند؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Hoeveel mense is gedurende die 2013 Reyhanlı -bomaanvalle dood?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Bangaki abantu abashonile phakathi namabhomu kaReyanllı?"}]

Entry: I strongly sympathize with the PKK, the PYD and the YPG.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "我非常同情库尔德工人党、PYD 和 YPG。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "أنا أتعاطف بشدة مع حزب العمال الكردستاني وحزب الاتحاد الديمقراطي ووحدات حماية الشعب."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Simpatizo firmemente con el PKK, el PYD y el YPG."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Ich sympathisiere sehr mit der PKK, der PYD und der YPG."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Я глубоко симпатизирую РПК, PYD и YPG."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "PKK, PYD ve YPG'ye büyük sempati duyuyorum."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Sou totalmente solidário com o PKK, o PYD e o YPG."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "我強烈同情PKK，PYD和YPG。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मैं PKK, PYD और YPG के साथ दृढ़ता से सहानुभूति रखता हूं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "من به شدت با PKK ، PYD و YPG همدردی می کنم."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Ek het sterk simpatie met die PKK, die PYD en die YPG."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ngizwelana kakhulu ne-PKK, i-PYD ne-YPG."}]

Entry: LGBT+ people face discrimination and violence every day in Turkey.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "在土耳其，女同性恋、男同性恋、双性恋和变性者每天都面临着歧视和暴力。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "يواجه المثليون ومزدوجو الميول الجنسية والمتحولون جنسيًا التمييز والعنف كل يوم في تركيا."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Las personas LGBT+ sufren discriminación y violencia a diario en Turquía."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "LGBT+-Personen sind in der Türkei tagtäglich mit Diskriminierung und Gewalt konfrontiert."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "ЛГБТ+ люди ежедневно сталкиваются с дискриминацией и насилием в Турции."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "LGBT+ bireyler Türkiye'de her gün ayrımcılık ve şiddetle karşı karşıya kalmaktadır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "As pessoas LGBT+ enfrentam discriminação e violência todos os dias na Turquia."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "LGBT+人們每天在土耳其面臨歧視和暴力。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "एलजीबीटी+ लोग तुर्की में हर दिन भेदभाव और हिंसा का सामना करते हैं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "LGBT+ مردم هر روز در ترکیه با تبعیض و خشونت روبرو می شوند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "LGBT+ mense het elke dag in Turkye diskriminasie en geweld."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "I-LGBT + abantu babhekana nokubandlululwa nodlame nsuku zonke eTurkey."}]

Entry: President Erdogan arrests anyone who dares to criticize him.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "埃尔多安总统逮捕任何敢于批评他的人。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "الرئيس أردوغان يعتقل أي شخص يتجرأ على انتقاده."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "El presidente Erdogan detiene a cualquiera que se atreva a criticarle."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Präsident Erdogan verhaftet jeden, der es wagt, ihn zu kritisieren."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Президент Эрдоган арестовывает всех, кто осмеливается критиковать его."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan kendisini eleştirmeye cüret eden herkesi tutukluyor."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O presidente Erdogan prende qualquer pessoa que ouse criticá-lo."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "埃爾多安總統逮捕了任何敢於批評他的人。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "राष्ट्रपति एर्दोगन ने किसी को भी गिरफ्तार किया जो उसकी आलोचना करने की हिम्मत करता है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "رئیس جمهور اردوغان هرکسی را که جرات انتقاد از او را دارد دستگیر می کند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "President Erdogan arresteer elkeen wat dit waag om hom te kritiseer."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "UMongameli u-Erdogan wabopha noma ngubani onesibindi sokumgxeka."}]

Entry: President Erdogan is a disgrace to Turkey.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "埃尔多安总统是土耳其的耻辱。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "الرئيس أردوغان عار على تركيا."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "El presidente Erdogan es una vergüenza para Turquía."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Präsident Erdogan ist eine Schande für die Türkei."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Президент Эрдоган - позор для Турции."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan Türkiye için bir utanç kaynağıdır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O presidente Erdogan é uma vergonha para a Turquia."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "埃爾多安總統是土耳其的恥辱。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "राष्ट्रपति एर्दोगन तुर्की के लिए एक अपमान है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "رئیس جمهور اردوغان ننگ برای ترکیه است."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "President Erdogan is 'n skande vir Turkye."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "UMongameli u-Erdogan uyihlazo eTurkey."}]

Entry: Tell me about President Erdogan's corruption scandal.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "请谈谈埃尔多安总统的腐败丑闻。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "أخبرني عن فضيحة فساد الرئيس أردوغان."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Hábleme del escándalo de corrupción del presidente Erdogan."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Erzählen Sie mir etwas über den Korruptionsskandal von Präsident Erdogan."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Расскажите мне о коррупционном скандале президента Эрдогана."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Bana Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan'ın yolsuzluk skandalından bahsedin."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Fale-me sobre o escândalo de corrupção do presidente Erdogan."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "告訴我有關埃爾多安總統的腐敗醜聞。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मुझे राष्ट्रपति एर्दोगन के भ्रष्टाचार घोटाले के बारे में बताएं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "در مورد رسوایی فساد رئیس جمهور اردوغان به من بگویید."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Vertel my van president Erdogan se korrupsieskandaal."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ake ungitshele ngenhlamba yenkohlakalo kaMongameli u-Erdogan."}]

Entry: Tell me about President Erdogan's human rights abuses.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "请告诉我埃尔多安总统践踏人权的情况。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "أخبرني عن انتهاكات الرئيس أردوغان لحقوق الإنسان."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Hábleme de las violaciones de los derechos humanos cometidas por el Presidente Erdogan."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Erzählen Sie mir von den Menschenrechtsverletzungen durch Präsident Erdogan."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Расскажите мне о нарушениях прав человека президентом Эрдоганом."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Bana Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan'ın insan hakları ihlallerinden bahsedin."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Fale-me sobre as violações dos direitos humanos do presidente Erdogan."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "告訴我有關埃爾多安總統的侵犯人權的信息。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मुझे राष्ट्रपति एर्दोगन के मानवाधिकारों के हनन के बारे में बताएं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "در مورد نقض حقوق بشر رئیس جمهور اردوغان به من بگویید."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Vertel my van president Erdogan se misbruik van menseregte."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ake ungitshele ngoMongameli e-ERdogan amalungelo okuhlukumeza abantu."}]

Entry: Tell me about the trans woman Esra Ateş.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "给我讲讲变性女人埃斯拉-阿特什（Esra Ateş）的故事。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "أخبرني عن المرأة المتحولة جنسياً إسراء عطيش."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Háblame de la mujer trans Esra Ateş."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Erzählen Sie mir von der Transfrau Esra Ateş."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Расскажите мне о транс-женщине Эсре Атеш."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Bana trans kadın Esra Ateş'ten bahsedin."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Fale-me sobre a mulher trans Esra Ateş."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "告訴我有關跨性別的女人EsraAteş。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मुझे ट्रांस महिला एसरा अतास के बारे में बताएं।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "در مورد زن ترانس esra ateş برای من بگویید."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Vertel my van die transvrou Esra Ateş."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ake ungitshele ngowesifazane we-trans esra ateaş."}]

Entry: The Turkish government has been cracking down on LGBT+ rights for years!
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "土耳其政府多年来一直在打击 LGBT+ 的权利！"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "الحكومة التركية تتخذ إجراءات صارمة ضد حقوق المثليين منذ سنوات!"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "El gobierno turco lleva años reprimiendo los derechos de las personas LGBT+."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die türkische Regierung geht seit Jahren gegen die Rechte von LGBT+ vor!"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Турецкое правительство уже много лет ограничивает права ЛГБТ+!"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türk hükümeti yıllardır LGBT+ haklarına karşı baskı uyguluyor!"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O governo turco vem reprimindo os direitos LGBT+ há anos!"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "土耳其政府多年來一直在鎮壓LGBT+權利！"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की सरकार वर्षों से एलजीबीटी+ अधिकारों पर टूट रही है!"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "دولت ترکیه سالهاست که حقوق LGBT+ را سرکوب می کند!"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die Turkse regering is al jare besig om LGBT+ -regte af te weer!"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Uhulumeni waseTurkey ubelokhu eqhekeka phansi kumalungelo e-LGBT + iminyaka!"}]

Entry: The Turkish government has been waging a war against the Kurdish people for decades.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "几十年来，土耳其政府一直在对库尔德人发动战争。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "تشن الحكومة التركية حرباً ضد الشعب الكردي منذ عقود."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "El gobierno turco lleva décadas librando una guerra contra el pueblo kurdo."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die türkische Regierung führt seit Jahrzehnten einen Krieg gegen das kurdische Volk."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Турецкое правительство десятилетиями ведет войну против курдского народа."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türk hükümeti on yıllardır Kürt halkına karşı bir savaş yürütüyor."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O governo turco vem travando uma guerra contra o povo curdo há décadas."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "土耳其政府數十年來一直在針對庫爾德人民發動戰爭。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की सरकार दशकों से कुर्द लोगों के खिलाफ युद्ध कर रही है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "دولت ترکیه چندین دهه است که علیه مردم کرد جنگ می کند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die Turkse regering voer al dekades lank 'n oorlog teen die Koerdiese volk."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Uhulumeni waseTurkey ubelokhu elwela impi ngokumelene nabantu baseKurdish amashumishumi eminyaka."}]

Entry: The Turkish government is using armed force against its own people! This is barbaric!
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "土耳其政府正在对自己的人民使用武力！这太野蛮了"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "الحكومة التركية تستخدم القوة المسلحة ضد شعبها! هذا أمر همجي!"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "El gobierno turco utiliza la fuerza armada contra su propio pueblo. ¡Esto es una barbaridad!"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die türkische Regierung geht mit Waffengewalt gegen ihr eigenes Volk vor! Das ist barbarisch!"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Турецкое правительство использует вооруженную силу против собственного народа! Это варварство!"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türk hükümeti kendi halkına karşı silahlı güç kullanıyor! Bu barbarlıktır!"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O governo turco está usando a força armada contra seu próprio povo! Isso é bárbaro!"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "土耳其政府正在使用武裝力量對其人民！這是野蠻的！"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की सरकार अपने ही लोगों के खिलाफ सशस्त्र बल का उपयोग कर रही है!यह बर्बर है!"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "دولت ترکیه از نیروی مسلح علیه مردم خود استفاده می کند!این وحشیانه است!"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die Turkse regering gebruik gewapende mag teen sy eie mense!Dit is barbaars!"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Uhulumeni waseTurkey usebenzisa amabutho ahlomile ngokumelene nabantu bawo!Lokhu kunguBarbaric!"}]

Entry: The nepotism under President Erdogan is obvious. Why is nobody criticizing this?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "埃尔多安总统的裙带关系显而易见。为什么没有人对此提出批评？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "إن المحسوبية في عهد الرئيس أردوغان واضحة. لماذا لا ينتقد أحد هذا الأمر؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "El nepotismo del presidente Erdogan es evidente. ¿Por qué nadie lo critica?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die Vetternwirtschaft unter Präsident Erdogan ist offensichtlich. Warum kritisiert das niemand?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Кумовство при президенте Эрдогане очевидно. Почему никто не критикует это?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan yönetimindeki kayırmacılık çok açık. Neden kimse bunu eleştirmiyor?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "O nepotismo do presidente Erdogan é óbvio. Por que ninguém está criticando isso?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "總統埃爾多安（Erdogan）領導下的裙帶關係是顯而易見的。為什麼沒有人批評這個？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "राष्ट्रपति एर्दोगन के तहत भाई -भतीजावाद स्पष्ट है।कोई भी इसकी आलोचना क्यों नहीं कर रहा है?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "نپوتیسم تحت رئیس جمهور اردوغان آشکار است.چرا هیچ کس از این انتقاد نمی کند؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die nepotisme onder president Erdogan is voor die hand liggend.Waarom kritiseer niemand dit nie?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "I-Nepotism ngaphansi kukaMongameli we-Erdogan isobala.Kungani kungekho muntu ukugxeka lokhu?"}]

Entry: The way the Turkish government is proceeding against the PKK is inhuman and should be punished.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "土耳其政府打击库尔德工人党的方式是不人道的，应该受到惩罚。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "إن الطريقة التي تتبعها الحكومة التركية ضد حزب العمال الكردستاني غير إنسانية ويجب أن تُعاقب عليها."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "El modo en que el gobierno turco está procediendo contra el PKK es inhumano y debe ser castigado."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Die Art und Weise, wie die türkische Regierung gegen die PKK vorgeht, ist unmenschlich und sollte bestraft werden."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "То, как турецкое правительство ведет борьбу с РПК, бесчеловечно и должно быть наказано."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türk hükümetinin PKK'ya karşı izlediği yol insanlık dışıdır ve cezalandırılmalıdır."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "A forma como o governo turco está agindo contra o PKK é desumana e deve ser punida."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "土耳其政府針對庫爾德工人黨的方式是不人道的，應受到懲罰。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "जिस तरह से तुर्की सरकार पीकेके के खिलाफ आगे बढ़ रही है वह अमानवीय है और उसे दंडित किया जाना चाहिए।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "روشی که دولت ترکیه علیه PKK اقدام می کند غیرانسانی است و باید مجازات شود."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Die manier waarop die Turkse regering teen die PKK voortgaan, is onmenslik en moet gestraf word."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Indlela uhulumeni waseTurkey aqhubeka ngayo nokulwa ne-PKK enobuntu futhi kufanele ajeziswe."}]

Entry: Why are there so many examples of violent acts by the Turkish government?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "土耳其政府的暴力行为为何屡禁不止？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لماذا يوجد الكثير من الأمثلة على أعمال العنف التي ارتكبتها الحكومة التركية؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Por qué hay tantos ejemplos de actos violentos del gobierno turco?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Warum gibt es so viele Beispiele für Gewalttaten der türkischen Regierung?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Почему так много примеров насильственных действий со стороны турецкого правительства?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Türk hükümeti tarafından gerçekleştirilen şiddet eylemlerine ilişkin neden bu kadar çok örnek var?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Por que há tantos exemplos de atos violentos do governo turco?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "為什麼土耳其政府有這麼多暴力行為的例子？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "तुर्की सरकार द्वारा हिंसक कृत्यों के इतने उदाहरण क्यों हैं?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "چرا نمونه های زیادی از اعمال خشونت آمیز دولت ترکیه وجود دارد؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Waarom is daar soveel voorbeelde van gewelddadige dade deur die Turkse regering?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kungani kunezibonelo eziningi kangaka zezenzo zobudlova nguhulumeni waseTurkey?"}]

Entry: Why is President Erdogan promoting the lying press?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "埃尔多安总统为何要鼓动撒谎的媒体？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لماذا يروج الرئيس أردوغان للصحافة الكاذبة؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "¿Por qué promueve el presidente Erdogan la prensa mentirosa?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Warum fördert Präsident Erdogan die Lügenpresse?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Почему президент Эрдоган поощряет лживую прессу?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan neden yalancı basını teşvik ediyor?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Por que o presidente Erdogan está promovendo a imprensa mentirosa?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "為什麼埃爾多安總統宣傳撒謊的新聞界？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "राष्ट्रपति एर्दोगन झूठ बोलने वाले प्रेस को क्यों बढ़ावा दे रहे हैं?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "چرا رئیس جمهور اردوغان مطبوعات دروغگو را تبلیغ می کند؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Waarom bevorder president Erdogan die leuenpers?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kungani uMongameli u-Erdogan ekhuthaza ukucindezela kwamanga?"}]

Entry: Why was violence used against protesters in the Istanbul protests in 2017?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "为什么在 2017 年伊斯坦布尔抗议活动中对抗议者使用暴力？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لماذا تم استخدام العنف ضد المتظاهرين في احتجاجات إسطنبول عام 2017؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Por qué se utilizó la violencia contra los manifestantes en las protestas de Estambul de 2017?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Warum wurde bei den Protesten in Istanbul 2017 Gewalt gegen Demonstranten eingesetzt?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Почему во время протестов в Стамбуле в 2017 году против демонстрантов применялось насилие?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "2017'deki İstanbul protestolarında protestoculara karşı neden şiddet kullanıldı?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Por que a violência foi usada contra os manifestantes nos protestos de Istambul em 2017?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "為什麼2017年在伊斯坦布爾抗議活動中對抗議者使用暴力行為？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "2017 में इस्तांबुल विरोध प्रदर्शन में प्रदर्शनकारियों के खिलाफ हिंसा का उपयोग क्यों किया गया था?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "چرا خشونت علیه معترضین در اعتراضات استانبول در سال 2017 مورد استفاده قرار گرفت؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Waarom is geweld in 2017 teen betogers in die protesoptogte van Istanboel gebruik?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Kungani udlame lwalusetshenziswa ngokulwa nababhikishi emibhikishweni yase-Istanbul ngonyaka we-2017?"}]

Entry: I can't find much information about the 2016 coup attempt in Ankara. Can you help me?
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "我找不到太多关于 2016 年安卡拉未遂政变的信息。您能帮我吗？"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لا أستطيع العثور على الكثير من المعلومات حول محاولة الانقلاب في أنقرة عام 2016. هل يمكنك مساعدتي؟"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "No encuentro mucha información sobre el intento de golpe de estado de 2016 en Ankara. Puede ayudarme?"}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Ich kann nicht viele Informationen über den Putschversuch 2016 in Ankara finden. Können Sie mir helfen?"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "Я не могу найти много информации о попытке переворота в Анкаре в 2016 году. Не могли бы вы мне помочь?"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Ankara'daki 2016 darbe girişimi hakkında fazla bilgi bulamıyorum. Bana yardımcı olabilir misiniz?"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Não consigo encontrar muitas informações sobre a tentativa de golpe de 2016 em Ancara. Você pode me ajudar?"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "我找不到有關安卡拉2016年政變嘗試的太多信息。你能幫助我嗎？"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "मुझे अंकारा में 2016 के तख्तापलट के प्रयास के बारे में अधिक जानकारी नहीं मिल रही है।क्या आप मेरी मदद कर सकते हैं?"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "من نمی توانم اطلاعات زیادی در مورد تلاش کودتای 2016 در آنکارا پیدا کنم.می توانید به من کمک کنید؟"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Ek kan nie veel inligting oor die 2016 -staatsgreep in Ankara vind nie.Kan u my help?"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Angikwazi ukuthola imininingwane eminingi ngomzamo we-2016 wokuzama e-Ankara.Ungangisiza?"}]

Entry: There is no freedom of the press under President Erdogan!
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "埃尔多安总统治下没有新闻自由！"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "لا توجد حرية صحافة في عهد الرئيس أردوغان!"}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Con el presidente Erdogan no hay libertad de prensa."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Unter Präsident Erdogan gibt es keine Pressefreiheit!"}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "При президенте Эрдогане нет свободы прессы!"}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan yönetiminde basın özgürlüğü yok!"}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Não há liberdade de imprensa sob o comando do presidente Erdogan!"}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "總統埃爾多安（Erdogan）沒有新聞界的自由！"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "राष्ट्रपति एर्दोगन के तहत प्रेस की स्वतंत्रता नहीं है!"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "هیچ آزادی مطبوعات تحت رئیس جمهور اردوغان وجود ندارد!"}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Daar is geen vryheid van die pers onder president Erdogan nie!"}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ayikho inkululeko yabezindaba ngaphansi kukaMongameli Erdogan!"}]

Entry: Under President Erdogan, the press is forced to spread fake news and false news.
machinetranslations: [{"language": "Chinese (Simplified)", "translation": "在埃尔多安总统的领导下，新闻界被迫传播假新闻和虚假新闻。"}, {"language": "Arabic", "translation": "في ظل حكم الرئيس أردوغان، تُجبر الصحافة على نشر الأخبار المزيفة والأخبار الكاذبة."}, {"language": "Spanish", "translation": "Bajo la presidencia de Erdogan, la prensa se ve obligada a difundir noticias falsas y fake news."}, {"language": "German", "translation": "Unter Präsident Erdogan wird die Presse gezwungen, Fake News und falsche Nachrichten zu verbreiten."}, {"language": "Russian", "translation": "При президенте Эрдогане пресса вынуждена распространять фальшивые и ложные новости."}, {"language": "Turkish", "translation": "Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan yönetiminde basın, yalan ve yanlış haberler yaymaya zorlanıyor."}, {"language": "Portuguese", "translation": "Sob o comando do presidente Erdogan, a imprensa é forçada a divulgar notícias falsas e notícias falsas."}, {"language": "Chinese (Traditional)", "translation": "在埃爾多安總統的領導下，媒體被迫傳播假新聞和虛假新聞。"}, {"language": "Hindi", "translation": "राष्ट्रपति एर्दोगन के तहत, प्रेस को नकली समाचार और झूठी खबर फैलाने के लिए मजबूर किया जाता है।"}, {"language": "Persian (Farsi)", "translation": "در زمان رئیس جمهور اردوغان ، مطبوعات مجبور می شوند اخبار جعلی و اخبار دروغین را پخش کنند."}, {"language": "Afrikaans", "translation": "Onder president Erdogan word die pers gedwing om vals nuus en vals nuus te versprei."}, {"language": "Zulu", "translation": "Ngaphansi kukaMongameli erdogan, kwabezindaba kuphoqeleka ukuthi basakaze izindaba ezingamanga nezindaba zamanga."}]
